Shop Files
This base package makes 3 files able to be modified by a3 packages: [list] [*] shopitemtype.ndb: used for changing shop prices. [*] shoppingitems.ndb: the main shop file contains details for all buyable and sellable items in game. [*] shopsubcategory1.ndb: determines which items are actually shown in the shop. [/list]
Other Information: [list] [*] [color=yellow]If a mod collides with this base package, then just simply disable this package, because a mod you want to use probably contains these files.[/color] [/list]
